PETITION AGAINST STOPING POST STUDY WORK VISA

Responsible department: Home Office

UK Goverment and British council advertised in all the countries saying if students come to study in UK, they can stay back and gain work experience for 2 years after studies . But now after collecting the fees from thousands of students the government backed out and denied POST STUDY WORK VISA for all international students. We request the government to review its decision and Grant POST STUDY WORK VISAS to these international students who came to UK believing the UK government.
